message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"worker; person who does physical or manual work","sentence":"工人在这里。","image_prompt":"A single worker in simple, plain clothes stands in an empty space with faint, crumbling city structures in the background. The worker appears focused and hardworking, holding basic tools like a hammer or wrench, framed by soft, dreamy apocalyptic lighting and gentle desolation. Soft, animated style with muted, pastel tones.","sentence_translation":"The worker is here."}
